definition: go in search of or hunt for
details:
verb
- go in search of or hunt for
= example: go in search of or hunt for
= synonyms: quest for
- follow in or as if in pursuit
= example: follow in or as if in pursuit
= synonyms: follow
- carry out or participate in an activity
= synonyms: engage
- carry further or advance
= synonyms: follow up on, act on
